changeSet.author: kirill.medvedev
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sportsmans( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, first_name TEXT NOT NULL, last_name TEXT NOT NULL, email TEXT NOT NULL, birthday DATE NOT NULL );

changeSet.author: kirill.medvedev
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS runs( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, start_run TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL, finish_run TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL, distance NUMERIC NOT NULL, sportsman_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES sportsmans (id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
